content: उल्लस् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To jump up, sport, play, wave, flutter; उल्लसितासितपताकासहस्रं <ls>K. 96</ls>; <ls>Śi. 5. 47</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 5.">53.</ls> {@--2@} To flash, shine, glitter, sparkle; उल्लसत्कांचनकुंडलाग्रं <ls>Śi. 3. 5</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 3.">33</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">5. 55</ls>; <ls n="Śi.">16. 61</ls>; <ls n="Śi.">20. 56</ls>; (<ab>fig.</ab>) to brighten or cheer up; <ls>K. 189.</ls> {@--3@} To rise, appear forth; <ls>Śi. 4. 58</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">6. 51</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">16. 51</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 38.</ls> {@--4@} To be reflected; <ls>Śi. 11. 54.</ls> {@--5@} To blow. open, be expanded. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to jump up or play. {@--2@} To brighten, illuminate, grace; <ls>Ve. 1. 12</ls>; <ls>U. 4.</ls> {@--3@} To divert, delight. {@--4@} To shake, move <ls>K. 22</ls>; <ls>Ki. 16. 37.</ls>
